channel.title: [IN PROGRESS] More themes pl0x
channel.description: More themes please! The current 2 available are not really the best!

item.title: [IN PROGRESS] More themes pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

There will definitely be an opportunity for more themes once we upgrade the forum, the community will be informed when we’re done with that and we can discuss what needs adding then in some form of community vote.

Read full topic

item.title: [IN PROGRESS] More themes pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

A while back (probably a year or two now) MITB said he’s willing to add themes for Moparcraft, as long as more than a couple people want them and will use them. I’m sure it’s the same in this situation; find one that will work, and if enough people like it, I’m sure it will be no problem.

Read full topic

item.title: [IN PROGRESS] More themes pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Dark themes, light themes and maybe even seasonal/event themes for example a Christmas theme for Christmas. It does not really matter for a specific type of theme but to have more of a choice to be available to us.

Read full topic

item.title: [IN PROGRESS] More themes pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:16, topic:519729”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=638221.msg4301596#msg4301596 date=1369088758]
If you’re going to suggest adding new themes, provide some possibilities for us to use. It’s difficult to find themes that work with the forums since they’ve been heavily modified they have to be manually edited to work.
[/quote]

sounds like your up for the job, is not obv why we need more themes?[/quote]
It’d be moparisthebest who actually edited them, not me :P. I didn’t mean give me reasons, I meant give us examples of the themes you’d like to see.

Read full topic

item.title: [IN PROGRESS] More themes pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:10, topic:519729”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=638221.msg4301517#msg4301517 date=1369081770]

yes and I want an adult section but we haven’t gotten that either >.<

Perhaps because there are minors browsing this forum, and a user can easily make their age in the 20’s?
[/quote]true, but if we are using taharoks theory that everyone has to be 13 plus at your own risk then you have to assume that a person should be responsible and only view 18 plus content when they are 18 plus.

It is illegal to present bad picsographic/mature material to minors regardless, so we cannot rely on a user’s integrity alone to have this board present.
Besides the fact that it is stated in the global rules that you cannot post mature content on this site, but discuss it to a certain degree. To have this board present would ultimately deem that rule redundant.[/quote]
If there was a badge on here for debating, you would absolutely be the very first person to receive it.

Read full topic

item.title: [IN PROGRESS] More themes pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:8, topic:519729”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=638221.msg4301507#msg4301507 date=1369080738]

yes and I want an adult section but we haven’t gotten that either >.<

Perhaps because there are minors browsing this forum, and a user can easily make their age in the 20’s?
[/quote]true, but if we are using taharoks theory that everyone has to be 13 plus at your own risk then you have to assume that a person should be responsible and only view 18 plus content when they are 18 plus.[/quote]
It is illegal to present pornographic/mature material to minors regardless, so we cannot rely on a user’s integrity alone to have this board present.
Besides the fact that it is stated in the global rules that you cannot post mature content on this site, but discuss it to a certain degree. To have this board present would ultimately deem that rule redundant.

Read full topic

item.title: [IN PROGRESS] More themes pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

This has been posted in the past, and I’m not sure as to how valid what I’m about to say is. I did read somewhere that interchangeable SMF themes are susceptible to SQL injections, as well as the staff had decided that there aren’t any quality themes for the users to choose from.
Otherwise, I don’t see why not, it doesn’t hurt anyone.

EDIT:

In relation to themes, I remember this being discussed frequently a while back and more themes are a possibility. The only obstacle are the forums themselves, I remember Taharok saying that he would only add more themes when the forums upgraded.

Taharok said somewhere that he doesn’t believe the forums will be upgraded anytime soon as well, if I remember correctly.

Read full topic
